resources.string: Your user name can be written only with numbers and English letters. No special punctuation (.,""-_ and etc). Length of input is limited to 15 characters.
The length of the password is limited to 15 characters. Only spaces can not be written.

Welcome to our app. In order to continue you have to enter your user name and password, but if this is your first time entering the app, please consider registering to our app. (If you need additional information about the process you can enter the information tab which is located in the menu to your upper right)
